actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Rural Development, and Research

official_title: To amend the adjusted gross income limitation on participation in conservation programs administered by the Department of Agriculture to exempt producers operating in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Amends the Food Security Act of 1985, as amended by the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002, to permit farming, ranching, or forestry operators in Hawaii to receive erosion and wetland and specified conservation payments without regard to gross income (and farm-related income) limitations.

titles.title: To amend the adjusted gross income limitation on participation in conservation programs administered by the Department of Agriculture to exempt producers operating in the State of Hawaii.
